title: The tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark as it is now acted at His Highness the Duke of York's Theatre / by William Shakespeare.
author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.
publisher: Printed by Andr. Clark for J. Martyn and H. Herringman ...,
notes: Alterations and additions by Sir William D'Avenant. Cf. Branam, G.C. Eighteenth-century adaptations of Shakespearean tragedy.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
